title: Fork, ca. 1744
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Two long curved tines, rounded shoulders and a baluster-shaped neck. Silver ferrule has horizontal bands and a scalloped edge. Pistol-shaped white porcelain handle with dark blue floral and scrolled decoration.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1744.
ca. 1744. porcelain, steel, silver. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-229.
